sentences.sentence: I do want to write more of my time travel stories featuring my temporal interventionists (the latest being "These Are the Times" in the November 2007 Analog).
sentences.translation: 我还想写更多的时间旅行题材小说，卖点在于我的时空干扰描写。

sentences.sentence: The protectionists and interventionists have not been able to advance a single word in pertinent and objective rejoinder.
sentences.translation: 保护主义者和干涉主义者找不到一个字来中肯和客观地反驳。

sentences.sentence: At that time three-quarters of our country was in the hands of foreign interventionists.
sentences.translation: 当时我国四分之三的领土都落在外国武装干涉者手中。
